Data Fields
sg_font_header_t Struct Reference

Defines the header for a bitmap font. More...

#include <sg_font_types.h>

Detailed Description

A bitmap font looks like this in memory (or a file):

sg_font_header_t hdr; sg_font_kerning_pair_t kerning0; sg_font_kerning_pair_t kerning1; ... sg_font_char_t char0; sg_font_char_t char1; ... sg_font_char_t char94; const u8 char0_data[sg_calc_bmap_size(sg_dim(char0.width, char0.height)]; const u32 char1_data[sg_calc_bmap_size(sg_dim(char1.width, char1.height)]; ... const u32 char94_data[sg_calc_bmap_size(sg_dim(char94.width, char94.height)];

Data Fields

u8 num_chars
 
u8 max_word_width
 
u8 max_height
 
u8 bits_per_pixel
 
u32 size

Field Documentation

u8 sg_font_header_t::bits_per_pixel

Number of bits in each pixel of the font bitmap

u16 sg_font_header_t::canvas_height

Height of the canvas in pixels

u16 sg_font_header_t::canvas_width

Width of the canvas in pixels

u16 sg_font_header_t::kerning_pairs

Number of kerning pairs stored in the font

u8 sg_font_header_t::max_height

Maximum height of a character

u8 sg_font_header_t::max_word_width

Max number of bytes per line of a font

u8 sg_font_header_t::num_chars

Number of characters in a font

u32 sg_font_header_t::size

Number of bytes the header occupies (header, character desc, and kerning info)

u16 sg_font_header_t::version

Version of the font format
